input:
On the floor, you see several items arranged in a row: a pink envelope, a black bracelet, a purple fidget spinner, a brown paperclip, a grey crayon, and a magenta cat toy. What is the color of the item directly to the right of the purple item?
Options:
(A) red
(B) orange
(C) yellow
(D) green
(E) blue
(F) brown
(G) magenta
(H) fuchsia
(I) mauve
(J) teal
(K) turquoise
(L) burgundy
(M) silver
(N) gold
(O) black
(P) grey
(Q) purple
(R) pink
